name: Initial Remote TI - Post-Flight Vitals
description: Quick post-flight inspection to identify obvious issues before dispatching personnel

metadata.author: RemoteTI
metadata.assumptions: Batteries are still the flown set. Drone may be misaligned. MedKit may not be mounted.

tasks.title: START CONDITIONS: Verify prerequisites
tasks.description:
Confirm all prerequisites for initial remote inspection are met.

Verify correct hangar/Skybase ID is selected.
Confirm camera feeds are LIVE with timestamp updates.
Verify no people are visible inside the Skybase.
This step is critical and cannot be skipped.
instructions: Confirm correct hangar/Skybase ID
Verify camera feeds are LIVE (check timestamps)
Confirm no people visible inside Skybase
STOP if any condition cannot be confirmed

tasks.title: CRITICAL SAFETY: Skybase environment check
tasks.description:
Inspect Skybase environment for immediate safety hazards.

Check for debris, tools, or loose objects on the floor.
Verify no objects near critical areas.
Ensure doors and enclosure appear normal.
instructions: Check for debris/tools/loose objects on floor
Verify clearance near propellers, landing gear, umbilical
Check doors/enclosure for obstruction or damage
STOP if anything could interfere with safety

tasks.title: DRONE SAFE STATE: Post-flight condition
tasks.description:
Verify drone is in safe post-flight state.

Confirm drone is completely stationary.
Check for stable landing gear position.
Look for any signs of thermal events or damage.
Immediate stop required if smoke, liquid, or damage observed.
instructions: Verify drone is stationary (no movement/rocking)
Check stability on landing gear (no abnormal tip/lean)
Look for smoke, steam, liquid, or heat haze
Check for obvious structural damage
STOP immediately if smoke/liquid/damage observed

tasks.title: PROPULSION: Visual danger check
tasks.description:
Quick visual inspection of propulsion system for immediate dangers.

Verify all 8 propellers are present and intact.
Check for visible damage or obstruction.
Confirm motors are not spinning.
Check navigation light pattern if visible.
instructions: Verify all propellers are present (none missing)
Check for broken/chipped propellers
Look for bent propellers or surface contact
Confirm motors are not spinning
Check nav light pattern (if known)
STOP if propeller damaged or drone appears armed

tasks.title: UMBILICAL: Quick visual check
tasks.description:
Visual inspection of umbilical and charging area.

Drone may not be aligned yet - focus on obvious issues.
Check connector area for damage.
Look for signs of electrical problems.
Verify no obvious misalignment if connected.
instructions: Check umbilical connector area for damage
Look for soot/burn marks around contacts
Verify no obvious mis-seat if connected
STOP if area burned or connector misaligned

tasks.title: PERIPHERALS: Quick inventory check
tasks.description:
Fast visual check for missing or broken peripherals.

Verify essential components are present.
Check for obvious damage to sensors.
Note: Some items may not be visible from all angles.
instructions: Check 4G antennas present (not snapped off)
Verify GPS masts present and upright
Check RealSense lenses not cracked/covered
Look for ETH/USB caps if visible
Check downlight and MiniFinder if visible
STOP if essential peripheral missing/broken

tasks.title: SYSTEM VITALS: UI status check
tasks.description:
Check system status from UI if available.

Review any warnings or faults in the system.
Verify telemetry and battery status.
Check for temperature or power warnings.
Only verify what your remote system actually shows.
instructions: Check for critical warnings/faults in UI
Verify LiveView or telemetry available
Check battery status reasonable for post-flight
Look for temperature/power warnings
STOP if critical system fault present

tasks.title: DISPATCH GATE: Go/No-Go decision
tasks.description:
Make dispatch decision based on inspection results.

If all items pass: DISPATCH OK
If any item failed or cannot be verified: DO NOT DISPATCH

Escalate to pilot/maintenance lead if issues found.
Document decision and reasoning.
instructions: Review all inspection results
Make PASS or STOP decision
If PASS: Clear for dispatch
If STOP: Do not dispatch, escalate immediately

tasks.title: DOCUMENTATION: Complete inspection record
tasks.description:
Complete mandatory documentation of inspection outcome.

Log in work order/ops channel.
Format: Name, Hangar, Timestamp, Initial RemoteTI PASS/STOP + comment

Example PASS: 'Oliver Wallin, Torslanda, 2026-01-17 14:06, Initial RemoteTI PASS'

Example STOP: 'Initial RemoteTI STOP â€“ damaged propeller front-right arm'

If abnormality found, submit Adverse Events form:
https://forms.gle/NF1nVe6F9GGWq5fZ8
instructions: Log outcome in work order/ops channel
Include Name, Hangar, Timestamp, Status
Add specific comment if STOP
Submit adverse events form if needed
